title: The Cravings
overview: Getting older does not necessarily mean getting more prosperous in life. For the single lady Je Gal Jae Young dealing with love, career, friendship, and family relationship is still difficult. Moving to a new neighborhood, making friends with new weird people, getting a new job and encountering her boyfriend's new girlfriend weren't that easy. To make things worse, she suffers from a disease that developed newly. Let's experience the solace of her daily warmmeal that will comfort her living the tough life. She cooks with whatever may be available, and feeds herself randomly.
